title: Himi 179
lyrics:
6-8’s
1.
Koe ‘Eiki pē ‘a koe
Ko e Ko Au, Māfimafi,
Pea ‘oku ou ‘atu ni,
‘Eiki ki he ‘Afiona;
‘A ia ‘oku ou ma’u ni
‘Oku ‘a’au kotoa pē.
2.
‘Oku ke, Ai Pē ‘akoe,
Pea mo e ‘ofa koe,
Pea mo e māfimafi,
Ke fai pē ho finangalo,
‘Eiki ‘ofa ke u fai ma’u pē,
Ki ho finangalo lelei.
3.
Pea ke fai loto taha,
‘E Hēvani mo māmani,
Pea faka’apa’apa
Ki he ‘Eiki langilangi,
Pea tui kotoa pē,
‘Eiki ki he ‘Afiona. *
